pages.text: A fantastic device, a marvel of modern engineering, physics, and cognition.$(br)When powered, the $(item)Resonator$() emits a vibration that matches that of the brainâ€™s pineal gland waves when it is at its highest point. $(br)This vibration also happens to bathe the area in a soothing purple-magenta glow.
In addition, this vibration resonates on the exact frequency of an otherwise intangible world that exists concurrent to ours, sometimes even allowing us and them to touch and see each other.

This cutting-edge technology can only be acquired through certified Miskatonic Faculty. However, one should be careful with operation as this machine must use up a large amount of power, though our patented Power Cells can aid with this.
Avoid agitating the machine if possible, such as using it for target practice.
